item.title: Bhakti & shAstrIya sangIta
item.description: #bhakti in #carnaticmusic, is it optional or mandatory? Are they intertwined? Many scholars have debated in the past, and in the present as well. Ofcourse, I surely do not want to answer to comments like ‘stick to your upanyasam’ or ‘ignorance advertisements’. Any retorts will only sideline the topic of discussion to settle personal scores. I surely don’t want to do that. Let us focus on #carnaticmusic part alone. (1) Vedas have inbuilt swaras, but these swaras don’t touch all the octaves that music in the current form does.
